comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: The TAISEI MARU (built in Kobe,1904) visited Sydney in - 1906 - "allotted No.3 buoy, just off Woolloomooloo Bay" - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14811849 1926 - "moored off Neutral Bay" - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/16266724 1934 - "at Circular Quay" - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/17048752 I think this is the 1906 visit, due to the position and the lack of development in Mosman.
